name: Dino's Adventure
description:
For a better playing experience, please enter full-screen mode. Creative Brief

Dino’s Adventure is a semi-rhythm game demo I made with Unity.

The story is about a robot girl, Dino, sent by the last survivors of Earth to determine if it is suitable for living. On the abandoned Earth, Dino encounters creatures eating the world and working to stop her from exploring it.

Initially, my positioning was similar to that of Cytus II, but in actual production, its gameplay has changed dramatically. Characters can run, jump, and shoot enemies at the rhythm of background music in the game. 

Subsequent levels of the game are still in production and will involve a series of puzzles and plots with the same core gameplay.

Nianhang

Version 1. 8

-Add Collectibles

-Change background music

-Add a warning sign
